comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when an admin user's personal storage quota has been exceeded. It will appear in a UI component that manages quotas, likely on a settings page or update notice. The exact appearance depends on the specific context of the "isAdmin" variable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'İstifadəçiyə düşən yaddaş kvotasını keçib' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Azerbaijani. It translates to 'The memory quota falling to the user has been exceeded'. A more natural translation would convey the meaning that the user has exceeded their allocated storage quota.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'İstifadəçinin yaddaş kvotasını aşdı' or 'İstifadəçi yaddaş kvotasını doldurdu'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Muistikiintiö per käyttäjä ylitetty' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Finnish. 'Per käyttäjä' is not the best phrasing. A more natural phrasing would use a preposition like 'per' or 'kohtaan'.

The translation 'Մեկ օգտատիրոջ համար պահեստի չափը գերազանցվել է' literally translates to 'The storage size for one user has been exceeded'. While understandable, it's less natural and not as concise as it could be. A more accurate and natural translation would convey that the 'per user' quota has been exceeded.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մեկ օգտատիրոջ համար սահմանված պահեստի չափը գերազանցվել է

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ເກີນກຳນົດການໃຊ້ເອກະລາດສໍາລັບຜູ້ໃຊ້ແລ້ວ" doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of "Storage quota per user exceeded". It translates to 'Independent usage limit exceeded for users'. While close, it lacks the specific mention of 'storage'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເກີນກຳນົດການໃຊ້ເອກະລາດສໍາລັບການເກັບຂໍ້ມູນຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້ແລ້ວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'lietotājam' should be checked. While technically correct, it is slightly formal. A more common and natural phrasing might be preferable.

The translation "Limit pamięci na użytkownika przekroczył" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Storage quota per user exceeded."  "Limit pamięci" literally translates to 'memory limit,' while 'storage quota' refers to the allocated space. The phrase "przekroczył" (exceeded) is technically correct, but the overall phrasing is clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Przekroczono limit przestrzeni dyskowej na użytkownika

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the wording "Przekroczono limit przestrzeni dyskowej na użytkownika" is a bit long. Consider shorter alternatives if possible depending on UI constraints.

The translation is overly literal and doesn't quite capture the natural phrasing in Romanian. 'Depășit limita permisă' is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be 'a fost depășită' or simply 'depășită'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cota spațiului de stocare per utilizator a fost depășită

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Cota spațiului de stocare per utilizator' is a bit verbose. A shorter, more concise translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cota de stocare per utilizator a fost depășită

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Превышена квота хранилища на пользователя' is too literal and doesn't quite convey the intended meaning in a natural Russian way. It translates to 'Storage quota per user exceeded'. A more natural phrasing would be 'Превышена лимита хранилища на пользователя' or 'Превышен лимит хранения на пользователя'.

The translation 'පරිශීලකයෙකු සඳහා ගබඩා කෝටාව ඉක්මවා ගියේය.' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'පරිශීලකයාගේ ගබඩා කෝටාව ඉක්මවා ඇත' or 'ගබඩා කෝටාව පරිශීලකයෙකු ඉක්මවා ඇත'.
The word 'Складишна' is likely a misspelling. It should be 'Прекомерна'.

The translation "Перевищено квоту пам'яті на користувача" while technically correct, is a bit literal and could be improved for clarity and flow. It translates to "Storage quota per user exceeded", but feels slightly awkward in Ukrainian. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the exceeding of the limit.
The translation '已超出每个用户的存储配额' is a literal translation but lacks the directness and urgency of 'Storage quota per user exceeded'. It's more descriptive than impactful.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 用户存储配额已达上限

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '每个用户的' (each user's) is redundant. The context implies it's per user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 用户存储配额已达上限
